i am a weirdo.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Hey there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing alright, just a little tired.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What's got you tired?
I've been working a lot lately. I'm the general manager of the local grocery store, and it's been really busy.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of work! I'm sure it's a lot of responsibility, too.
It is, but it's also very rewarding. I get to help people every day, and that's what makes it all worthwhile.
That's really great. I'm glad you find your job rewarding. I wish I could say the same about mine.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer, and I work from home.
Oh, that sounds really cool! Do you like it?
It's alright. I like the flexibility, but I miss being around people.
I can understand that. I like the social aspect of my job.
Yeah, it's nice to have some interaction with people outside of your family.
Exactly. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch YouTube videos, and I'm trying to learn Italian.
That's awesome! I love watching YouTube videos too. What kind of videos do you like to watch?
I like watching funny videos, and I also like watching videos about history and science.
I like watching funny videos too. I also like watching videos about music and sports.
I like watching videos about music too. I'm not really into sports, though.
That's okay. We can still be friends, even if we don't like the same things.
Exactly. I think we're going to be great friends.
I think so too
